title: Pebble smartwatch hits the big time, or at least the Best Buy
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Monday, July 8, 2013
contentencoded:
There has been a lot of talk about smartwatches as tech's next big object of desire. Apple has filed patents for one. Sony just released its own model. And today an independent, crowdfunded piece of tech called the Pebble goes on sale at Best Buy. But one big question remains: Will consumers actually want to read text messages and Facebook posts on their wrists?

Slate's tech blogger Will Oremus joins Marketplace Tech host Ben Johnson to discuss.
teaser: The Pebble smartwatch goes on sale today at Best Buy. Will consumers actually want to read text messages and listen to music from their wrists?
